description: After a scrumptious vegan dessert? Try this strawberry shortcake recipe. It's nutritionally approved and ready in under an hour.
keywords: Layer cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Aug 2021,Sesame free,Baking,Strawberry,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Healthier Vegan Strawberry Shortcake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup light extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a 20cm (5cm deep) square cake pan with baking paper, extending paper 3cm over sides.
Whisk milk, vinegar, vanilla, syrup and oil in a large jug. Set aside to rest for 5 minutes.

Combine flour, almond meal, baking powder and rosemary in a large bowl. Make a well in centre. Add milk mixture to flour mixture, then stir until just combined (avoid over-mixing). Pour mixture in pan and smooth top. Top with strawberries, pushing gently into batter.
Bake for 30 minutes or until golden and when a skewer inserted in centre comes out clean. Stand in pan for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack, top-side up, to cool. Serve.
